General.Name: Baltic Sea Properties AS
General.Description: Baltic Sea Properties AS invests in and develops real estate properties in the Baltics. The company owns, manages, and leases logistics, industrial, commercial, and retail properties, as well as office spaces. Baltic Sea Properties AS is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

7.Name: Mr. Sigitas  Jautakis
7.Title: MD of Lithuania Operations & Vilnius Director
